text: hi everyone my name is Nicole and I'm
going to be talking about Chicago
Chicago is my hometown it is located in
the middle of America
the Midwest and it is surrounded by Lake
Michigan now there are many amazing
things about Chicago there's a lot of
koreans who live in chicago they have
their own korean town and there's many
things to do when you visit Chicago the
Willis Tower it's one of the tallest
buildings in America it was formerly
called the Sears Tower and it's a great
place to go because you can go to the
top of the building and get a great view
of Chicago and the Midwest and Lake
Michigan the next thing is Wrigley Field
Wrigley Field is home to the Chicago
Cubs baseball team it's a very old
stadium it's been there a hundred years
and there's a lot of classic things in
there and it's a really pretty place
just to look also when you go they have
great food in Chicago one thing is
deep-dish pizza now deep-dish pizza is
from Chicago
so it's originated from there it's a
pizza that's very thick it's like a
couple of inches thick it's like a pie
and it's covered in a crust and then the
sauce goes next and then the meat and
cheese are on top so it's a lot
different from other pizzas but it's the
best pizza ever and you it's really
thick so you need a fork and knife to
eat with it and like one piece will get
you fall it's so good
also Chicago is very big and there are
many areas to it most of them are safe
but some places aren't very safe like
the Southside its kind of dangerous
there so if you go stay away from there
and then you'll be good thanks for
watching
